", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The \"Award of Puducherry State Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme\" initiated by the Directorate of School Education, Union Territory of Puducherry, is designed to make sure that no brilliant student is prevented on the grounds of poverty alone from pursuing an academic career. Through this scheme, scholarship is awarded to students studying in 11th and 12th standards and have secured promotion to the next higher class with 60% & 50% of marks in 10th and 11th standards respectively.
